extendedInfo.description: Itâs THE pop-chart of tech business news.** PCWorld - News Your Way: 10 News Aggregation Apps for Android Phones**** TechCrunch - Android App âCurrentlyâ Taps Twitter To Track Breaking Tech News **** AddictiveTips - Minimalistic Technology News Reader For Android **Do you want to know what the tech news headlines are that everyone is talking about? Currently Tech News sends you notifications for the top ones as they happen!Currently Tech News scans popular social networks to identify trending technology news from your favourite tech blogs. It updates a chart every 15 minutes, and only sends you a notification when it thinks a headline is hot.You can also scan the top headline chart, read the articles you're interested in and add to your Read Later list so you can store the headlines you're most interested in.Currently now comes with a widget, so you can keep the fastest trending headline right on your home screen.We built this app for people like us; technology professionals who live a fast paced, caffeine-consuming, meeting-to-meeting lifestyle. People who have little time to keep pace with industry news but need to stay in touch.Currently - Life's a pop-chart; stay on top of it.Features:* "Breaking News" notifications for hot headlines that move up the charts fast* Determines the top headlines every 15 minutes based on what everyone is talking about* Intuitive âpop-chartâ interface* "Past hour" and "Today" charts* Read Later to store the headlines that interest you the most* Home screen widget so you can see the top trending headline at a glance* Links to publisherâs original article (mobile optimised where available)Follow us on Twitter, http://twitter.com/currentlyapp and be sure to let us know what you think!

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: THE Best app. Simple interface,  nice quick options. Great job and keep it up. Thank you
reviews.author: Karna Jamwal

reviews.title: Simple and Well Done
reviews.comment: Very simple interface and options. If you need something very customizable and with the ability to choose news feeds, this isn\'t it. If you need something that just works, has a clean presentation, good selection of news sources, easy filtering, and just enough options to make it work as preferred, get this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget
reviews.comment: As far as I can tell no widget for ics tablet? Would make this app perfect if it did..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \342\210\232 Luv this
reviews.comment: The widget is perfect too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tech news aggregator
reviews.comment: Nicer layout and easier than setting up an rss feed. Covers all the tech news I wish to know about. Love this app! Keep up the good work. Only inclusion should be a favorites section to differentiate from articles you wish to read later but then delete
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ALL your tech news! HUGE time saver!
reviews.comment: Used to start my morning by opening five to seven tech blogs, and scanning posts to find what I wanted to read. Now, I just open Currently: one stop for all the best tech stories of the day.  Avoid all the filler. Save a ton of time. Get this app now!
reviews.author: Bryan Koch

reviews.title: CRASHES EVERYTIME
reviews.comment: I have not had a chance to use this. Everytime I try to the screen goes black and later a sign comes up and says it crashed. AT&T Galaxy S3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing app.
reviews.comment: All the news in one place. A must have!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: user this daily
reviews.comment: love this app! yes daily :)
reviews.author: Eric Larson

reviews.title: I love this
reviews.comment: I love this app but ever since Jan 4th it wont update. :/ I jave uninstalled and reinstalled and still nothing. Please help! Galaxy note 2
reviews.author: richard ryscik

reviews.title: No \'Past Week\'
reviews.comment: There\'s \'Past hour\', \'Today\', only. What about earlier news??
reviews.author: Ahmed A. S.

reviews.title: Force closes in Jelly Bean Kindle Fire
reviews.comment: My favorite news app, but force closes on my jelly Bean Kindle fire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well. Breaking news notification should be turned off by default tho.  I wouldn\'t have been happy if that had gone off in the middle of the nite
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app, hoping for UI improvements
reviews.comment: App has a lot of potential - easy to keep up to date on trending tech news from sites I care about most. Wish it could link to RSS feeds within the app itself rather than opening full article in a browser. A tablet interface would be sweet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet.
reviews.comment: Keeps one effectively updated. But can be overwhelming trying to keep the pace. Also, it\'s nice being able to share news via the twitter app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time Pit.
reviews.comment: This tech news crack app absorbs hours of my day.  Good thing you can\'t select your own sites to monitor, or my social life would be over!  ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugly but great
reviews.comment: It could use an ICS visual refresh but otherwise it\'s great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t like the fact that I\'d runs at boot and is always running in the background . Should be update when opened.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad news bears for me
reviews.comment: Love the idea. Love the info. Simple & To the point. But now I have a ton of other stuff I would love to read but have no time for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says but rss on the few sites it features would work too
reviews.comment: This is not really much more than some type of curated rss feed of a few top tech blogs. If I could add my own sites for it to filter.
reviews.author: A Google User
